title: Bontrager’s $350 Line Comp 30 are ready for impact with all new G609 alloy rim
content:
It’s been a busy couple of weeks for Bontrager – fresh off the release of a new Aeolus road wheel design and now changing gears for a new mountain wheel. Bontrager’s Line wheels are known as wheels that can take punishment and tackle a variety of terrain. We found this valid on the Line Pro […]

The post Bontrager’s $350 Line Comp 30 are ready for impact with all new G609 alloy rim appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
